variable.name: SUBJID
variable.description: NEIGHBOR Sample ID

variable.name: caco
variable.description: Case or control status 1: Control, 2: Case, 999: Other

variable.name: spec
variable.description: Blood or cheek cell DNA 1: Blood, 2: Cheek

variable.name: gender
variable.description: Gender 1: Male, 2: Female, 999: Missing

variable.name: agedxc
variable.description: Age at glaucoma diagnosis Age: Case 999: Control or Missing

variable.name: agerecr
variable.description: Age at study recruitment Age: Case or Control, 999: Missing

variable.name: IOP_at_coll_OD
variable.description: IOP OD closest to when DNA was collected 999: Missing

variable.name: IOP_at_coll_ OS
variable.description: IOP OS closest to when DNA was collected 999: Missing

variable.name: IOP> 21
variable.description: Elevated intraocular pressure (defined as maximum >21 1: Present, 2: Absent, 999: Missing

variable.name: vCDR_ OD
variable.description: Vertical cup disc ratio OD closest to time of DNA collection 0.0-1.0; or <0.7, 999: Missing

variable.name: vCDR_ OS
variable.description: Vertical cup disc ratio OS closest to time of DNA collection 0.0-1.0; or <0.7, 999: Missing

variable.name: #VFs
variable.description: # of VFs abnormal: 0,1,2 or more, 999: Missing

variable.name: spheqOD
variable.description: Spherical equivalent OD from distance refraction at time closest to DNA collection. If pt is pseudophakic use phakic refraction closest to DNA collection if possible. 999: Missing

variable.name: spheqOS
variable.description: Spherical equivalent OS from distance refraction at time closest to DNA collection. If pt is pseudophakic use phakic refraction closest to DNA collection if possible. 999: Missing

variable.name: sevGON
variable.description: Severe glaucomatous optic neuropathy accounting for Va< or = 20/200: 1:Yes, 2:No, 999: Missing

variable.name: PriorLTP
variable.description: H/o ALT or SLT in either eye 1:Yes, 2:No, 999: Missing

variable.name: PriorGFS
variable.description: H/o Trabeculectomy, Angle surgery (s.a. trabectome) or GDD implant in either eye 1: Yes, 2: No, 999: Missing

variable.name: CCT_ OD
variable.description: Mean CCT OD (in microns) closest to when DNA was collected 999: Missing

variable.name: CCT_ OS
variable.description: Mean CCT OS (in microns) closest to when DNA was collected 999: Missing

variable.name: hgla1stdegr
variable.description: Family history of glaucoma in 1st degree relatives 1: Yes, 2: No, 99: Unknown, 999: Missing

variable.name: hgla-x
variable.description: Family history of glaucoma in extended family members (aunts,uncles, cousins) 1: Yes, 2: No, 99: Unknown, 999: Missing

variable.name: dmhx
variable.description: Report of ever diabetes mellitus 1: Yes, 2: No, 999: Missing

variable.name: htnhx
variable.description: Report of ever systemic hypertension 1: Yes, 2: No, 999: Missing

variable.name: smkst1
variable.description: Cigarette smoking status 1: Current every day smoker, 2: current some day smoker, 3: former smoker; 4: never smoker, 999: Missing

variable.name: smkst2
variable.description: Cigarette smoking status 1: ever, 2: never, 999: Missing

variable.name: etoh_ age
variable.description: Age at 1st use 99: abstainer, 999: Missing

variable.name: etoh_ days
variable.description: # of days drinking in past month (0 to 30), 999: Missing

variable.name: drinks30
variable.description: # of drinks in past month (0-90 max), 999: Missing

variable.name: BMI
variable.description: BMI at enrollment 999: Missing

variable.name: WT
variable.description: Weight at enrollment (lbs) 999: Missing

variable.name: HT
variable.description: Height at enrollment (inches) 999: Missing

variable.name: sysBB
variable.description: Systemic beta blocker use at IOP measurment 1: Yes, 2: No, 999: Missing

variable.name: sysACEi
variable.description: Systemic ACE inhibitor use at IOP measurement 1: Yes, 2: No, 999: Missing

variable.name: sysCCB
variable.description: Systemic calcium channel blocker user at IOP measurement 1: Yes, 2: No, 999: Missing
